theory.brief: Từ để hỏi (Wh-words): What (cái gì), Where (ở đâu), When (khi nào), Who (ai), Why (tại sao), How (như thế nào), How often (bao lâu một lần), How many (bao nhiêu - đếm được). Liên từ: and (và), but (nhưng), or (hoặc), so (vì vậy) dùng để nối câu.
examples: What do you like? (Bạn thích cái gì?)
Where is the TV? (Cái TV ở đâu?)
I like cartoons, and my sister likes them too. (Tôi thích phim hoạt hình, và chị tôi cũng thích.)
I'm tired, so I'll go to bed. (Tôi mệt, vì vậy tôi sẽ đi ngủ.)
The film is good, but it's too long. (Phim hay, nhưng nó quá dài.)

exercises.question: _______ do you watch TV? - Every day.
_______ is your favourite programme? - It's cartoons.
_______ do you like watching TV? - Because it's fun.
_______ is the remote control? - On the table.
_______ does the show start? - At 7 PM.
_______ is your favourite MC? - Mr. Bean.
_______ channels are there? - More than 100.
I like sports, _______ my brother likes cartoons.
hints: 'and' nối hai câu cùng loại, 'but' nối câu đối lập

exercises.question: The film is good, _______ it's too long.
I'm tired, _______ I'll go to bed early.
Do you want tea _______ coffee?
We trained hard, _______ we won the game.
hints: Kết quả của việc tập luyện

exercises.question: She can sing _______ she can't dance.
I like reading _______ watching TV.
Study hard, _______ you will fail.
_______ do you go to school? - By bike.
_______ is the weather today? - It's sunny.
hints: Hỏi về tình trạng thời tiết

exercises.question: I love music, _______ I play the guitar every day.
hints: Kết quả của việc yêu âm nhạc

exercises.question: The programme is interesting, _______ the sound is bad.
Would you like orange juice _______ apple juice?
